summary: A hypochondriac vacations in the tropics for the fresh air - and finds himself in the middle of a revolution instead.
cast: Harold Lloyd|Jobyna Ralston|John Aasen|Wallace Howe|Jim Mason|Leo White|Gaylord Lloyd|Mark Jones|William Gillespie|Sam Lufkin|Lee Phelps|Charles Stevenson
director: Directors: Fred C. Newmeyer (as Fred Newmeyer), Sam Taylor
title: Why Worry?
